noun.description: A member of the Mobile of North America; = "Mobile".
A native or inhabitant of the city of Mobile.
A pidgin form of Choctaw used as a lingua franca in parts of the south-eastern United States.

adjective.description: Designating or belonging to Mobilian. Especially in "Mobilian Jargon", "Mobilian trade language".

origin: Mid 18th century. From French Mobilien from Mobile + -ien.
